TEXT: e1: Alternative treatments should be subsidized in the same way as conventional treatments,
e2: since both methods can lead to the prevention, mitigation or cure of an illness.

TEXT: e3: Besides it should be in the interest of the health insurers to recognize alternative medicine as treatment,

TEXT: e4: since there is a chance of recovery.
e5: It doesn't matter after all that those who administer the treatment don't have 'doctor status'.
